Mehta Family School of DS&AI

Partner with Us

Our School welcomes collaborations with stakeholders to establish state-of-the-art infrastructure and cutting-edge computing facilities. If you envision yourself as a potential stakeholder in our endeavor to set up a center of excellence for data science and artificial intelligence in North-East India, we would be delighted to collaborate with you! Do contact us to share your interests.
Our teaching curriculum combines state-of-the-art teaching, research, and technology development in the frontier areas of DS&AI, providing students with a strong theoretical foundation and emphasizing areas of interdisciplinary applications. Faculty and students of the school explore solving societal problems, including those of regional importance relating to water quality and usage, healthcare, and agriculture.
The IIT Guwahati School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence has partnered with the Mehta Family Foundation (in USA), which has a rich history in supporting initiatives enhancing the quality of life and access to education. The School receives guidance from members of the Mehta Family Foundation (MFF) CARE, many of whom are global experts in the field of DS&AI. This arrangement represents a unique approach to building 21st-century talent in India, particularly in emerging scientific and technological fields.

IIT Guwahati is an Institute of National Importance, consistently ranking among the top 8 engineering institutes in India according to the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) released by the Government of India. Our vision is to achieve global recognition for excellence in education, research, and innovation, nurturing future leaders to serve society at large. Located in the serene city of Guwahati, which serves as the gateway to North-East India, we aim to:

  • Provide education, research, and knowledge advancement.
  • Prepare students for successful careers and global leadership roles.
  • Motivate graduates to contribute significantly to developmental activities and serve society.
  • Address the technological needs of the region and the country.
  • Foster innovation, entrepreneurship, and inclusive development.
  • Make a positive impact on every individual we engage with, inspiring ethical value-based transformation.
